New Records: Virat Kohli fell short of a century but equaled Sachin Tendulkar's record with his 49th ODI century
Key Match Events: India won by four wickets with 12 balls to spare
Virat Kohli was dismissed on 95, just short of a century
KL Rahul was dismissed for the first time in the tournament
Mohammed Shami took five wickets for 54 runs
Ravindra Jadeja scored 39 not out in the last over
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bowl first
New Zealand lost the toss but performed well
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's performance and noted the importance of staying balanced
Mohammed Shami expressed confidence and pride in the team's effort
Tom Latham acknowledged New Zealand's effort and near miss
